title: [Snyk] SNYK-PYTHON-FONTTOOLS-14151621 in fonttools@4.38.0
description:
## XML Injection

**Severity:** medium
**Package:** fonttools@4.38.0
**File:** `score-processor-lambda/requirements.txt`

**CVSS Score:** 6.9  
**Exploit Maturity:** proof-of-concept  
**Snyk Priority Score:** 666/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2025-66034](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-66034)

**Fix:** Pin `fonttools` to version 4.61.0 or later.

### Details
## Overview
[fonttools](https://pypi.org/project/fonttools) is a Tools to manipulate font files

Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to XML Injection via the `main()` function in the `fontTools/varLib/__init__.py` file. An attacker can write files to the filesystem by supplying a specially crafted `.designspace` file.
## Remediation
Upgrade `fonttools` to version 4.61.0 or higher.

- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/fonttools/fonttools/commit/a696d5ba93270d5954f98e7cab5ddca8a02c1e32)
